bugreport.Summary: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user
bugreport.Discription: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application
bugreport.StepsToReproduce: <1>Login into the Application</1> <2>Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User</2> <3>Filled out all the user information fields</3> <4>Clicked on the 'Save' button</4> <5>Seen an error page 'ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error'</5> <6>See the attached logs for more information</6> <7>Also see the attached screenshot of the error page</7>
bugreport.ActualResult: On clicking the SAVE button, application crash
bugreport.ExpectedResult: On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message 'New User has been created successfully'
